entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Temperature rising to 12 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Clearing before morning. Fog patches dissipating after midnight. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Temperature rising to 12 by morning. Forecast issued 10:46 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. Temperature falling to plus 4 in the morning then rising.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to plus 4 in the morning then rising. UV index 7 or high. Forecast issued 10:46 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear early in the evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early in the evening. Wind becoming west 20 overnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 10:46 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
